Plot: A fire-fighting cadet, two college professors and a geeky but sexy government scientist work against an alien organism that has been rapidly evolving ever since its arrival on Earth inside a meteor.
Title: Evolution
Writer: Don Jakoby (story), David Diamond (screenplay), David Weissman (screenplay), Don Jakoby (screenplay)
Actors: David Duchovny, Julianne Moore, Orlando Jones, Seann William Scott
tomatoConsensus: Director Reitman tries to remake Ghostbusters, but his efforts are largely unsuccessful because the movie has too many comedic misfires.
